data.name: Tokyo Xanadu eX+: Outfit & Accessory Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Tokyo Xanadu eX+; a massive action RPG! When high school student Kou Tokisaka encounters the nightmare realm known as the Eclipse, his world is forever changed.

To use the DLC items, they must be first claimed from within the game. To claim the DLC items in-game, open the "Camp Menu" screen, select the menu option "ITEM", and navigate to the DLC tab.
From there, select each of the DLC items purchased that you wish to activate in-game. Once activated, the costumes and accessories can be equipped from the "EQUIP" menu option.

Note: Costumes purchased for characters not yet in the main party will be unable to be used until they join the main party.”

The Outfit & Accessory Bundle will provide you with the following:

Festival Costume Set

A special item that allows Asuka and Sora to change into "Festival Costumes".

Festival Costume - Asuka x 1
Festival Costume - Sora x 1


Heck on Wheels Set

A special item that allows Asuka to change into "Heck on Wheels".

Rider Set x 1
Moon Earring x 1
Rare Element "Fuuto" x 1


Summer Swimwear Set - Asuka

Allows Asuka to slip into some stunning swimwear.

Asuka's Swimsuit x 1
Asuka's Swimsuit w/o shoes x 1


Summer Swimwear Set - Sora

Allows Sora to slip into some stunning swimwear.

Sora's Swimsuit x 1
Sora's Swimsuit w/o shoes x 1


Summer Swimwear Set - Mitsuki

Allows Mitsuki to slip into some stunning swimwear.

Mitsuki's Swimsuit x 1
Mitsuki's Swimsuit w/o shoes x 1


Summer Swimwear Set - Rion

Allows Rion to slip into some stunning swimwear.

Rion's Swimsuit x 1
Rion's Swimsuit w/o shoes x 1


Useful Accessory Set

A sampling of five useful accessories.

Animal Keychain x 1
Alisa Strap x 1
Mona Strap x 1
Antibacterial Mask x 1
Colorful Beads x 1


Awesome Accessory Set

A sampling of five incredible accessories.

Morimaru Strap x 1
Bronze Charm x 1
Silver Earrings x 1
Gold Bangle x 1
Mythology Locket x 1

data.short_description: A bundle containing various costumes for Asuka, Sora, Mitsuki, and Rion, along with some in-game accessories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
